text: *gasp*... *gasp*...
Dammit! ...Why me?
I can't get caught... Not like this!
I-I've gotta find someone to pin this on...!
Someone like... him!!
I'll make it look like HE did it!

speaker: Phoenix
text: (Boy am I nervous!)

speaker: Mia
text: Wright!

speaker: Phoenix
text: Oh, h-hiya, Chief.

speaker: Mia
text: Whew, I'm glad I made it on time.

speaker: Mia
text: Well, I have to say Phoenix, I'm impressed!

speaker: Mia
text: Not everyone takes on a murder trial right off the bat like this.

speaker: Mia
text: It says a lot about you... and your client as well.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Um... thanks.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Actually, it's because I owe him a favor.

speaker: Mia
text: A favor?

speaker: Mia
text: You mean, you knew the defendant before this case?

speaker: Phoenix
text: Yes.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Actually, I kind of owe my current job to him.

speaker: Phoenix
text: He's one of the reasons I became an attorney.

speaker: Mia
text: Well, that's news to me!

speaker: Phoenix
text: I want to help him out any way I can!

speaker: Phoenix
text: I just... really want to help him. I owe him that much.
(It's over! My life, everything, it's all over!)

speaker: Mia
text: Is that your client screaming over there?

speaker: Phoenix
text: Yeah... it's him.
(Death! Despair! Ohhhh!)
(I'm gonna do it, I'm gonna die!!!)

speaker: Mia
text: It sounds like he wants to die...

speaker: Phoenix
text: Um, yeah. *sigh*

speaker: Butz
text: Nick!!!

speaker: Phoenix
text: Hey. Hey there, Larry.

speaker: Butz
text: Dude, I'm so guilty!! Tell them I'm guilty!!!

speaker: Butz
text: Gimme the death sentence! I ain't afraid to die!

speaker: Phoenix
text: What!? What's wrong, Larry?

speaker: Butz
text: Oh, it's all over... I... I'm finished. Finished!

speaker: Butz
text: I can't live in a world without her! I can't!

speaker: Butz
text: Who... who took her away from me, Nick? Who did this!?

speaker: Butz
text: Aww, Nick, ya gotta tell me! Who took my baby away!?

speaker: Phoenix
text: (Hmm... The person responsible for your girlfriend's death?)

speaker: Phoenix
text: (The newspapers say it was you...)

speaker: Phoenix
text: My name is Phoenix Wright.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Here's the story:

speaker: Phoenix
text: My first case is a fairly simple one.

speaker: Phoenix
text: A young woman was killed in her apartment.

speaker: Phoenix
text: The guy they arrested was the unlucky sap dating her:

speaker: Phoenix
text: Larry Butz... my best friend since grade school.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Our school had a saying: "When something smells, it's usually the Butz."

speaker: Phoenix
text: In the 23 years I've known him, it's usually been true.

speaker: Phoenix
text: He has a knack for getting himself in trouble.

speaker: Phoenix
text: One thing I can say though: it's usually not his fault. He just has terrible luck.

speaker: Phoenix
text: But I know better than anyone, that he's a good guy at heart.

speaker: Phoenix
text: That and I owe him one. Which is why I took the case... to clear his name.

speaker: Phoenix
text: And that's just what I'm going to do!

speaker: Judge
text: Court is now in session for the trial of Mr. Larry Butz.

speaker: Payne
text: The prosecution is ready, Your Honor.

speaker: Phoenix
text: The, um, defense is ready, Your Honor.

speaker: Judge
text: Ahem.

speaker: Judge
text: Mr. Wright?

speaker: Judge
text: This is your first trial, is it not?

speaker: Phoenix
text: Y-Yes, Your Honor. I'm, um, a little nervous.

speaker: Judge
text: Your conduct during this trial will decide the fate of your client.

speaker: Judge
text: Murder is a serious charge.

speaker: Judge
text: For your client's sake, I hope you can control your nerves.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Thank... thank you, Your Honor.

speaker: Judge
text: Mr. Wright, given the circumstances...

speaker: Judge
text: I think we should have a test to ascertain your readiness.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Yes, Your Honor.

speaker: Phoenix
text: (Gulp... Hands shaking... Eyesight... fading...)

speaker: Judge
text: The test will consist of a few simple questions. Answer them clearly and concisely.

speaker: Judge
text: Please state the name of the defendant in this case.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Um... the defendant... is me... right?

speaker: Mia
text: Wright! Have you completely lost your mind?

speaker: Mia
text: Focus! The defendant is the person on trial! You're his lawyer!

speaker: Phoenix
text: Um, er, eh? Oh yeah, right! Eh heh heh.

speaker: Mia
text: This is no laughing matter! You did pass the bar, didn't you?

speaker: Judge
text: Sorry, I couldn't hear your answer. I'll ask once more:

speaker: Phoenix
text: The, um, defendant? That's... er... Mia Fey?

speaker: Mia
text: Wrong, Wright. Look, I have to leave.

speaker: Mia
text: I have to go home. I'm... I'm expecting a delivery.

speaker: Phoenix
text: Aw, c'mon Chief. There's no need to be going so soon, is there?

speaker: Mia
text: Listen, Wright!

speaker: Mia
text: The defendant is the one on trial--your client!

speaker: Mia
text: I mean, that's about as basic as you can get!

speaker: Phoenix
text: (I put my foot in it this time! I've got to relax!)

speaker: Judge
text: Sorry, I couldn't hear your answer. I'll ask once more:

speaker: Phoenix
text: The defendant? Well, that's Larry Butz, Your Honor.

speaker: Judge
text: Correct. Just keep your wits about you and you'll do fine. Next question:

speaker: Judge
text: This is a murder trial. Tell me, what's the victim's name?
